text_block_list.text: It was the last day of Summer Training Camp. Today, once again……I'm being stared at.
I've gotten used to this situation as well. So, whenever I felt that gaze on me, I would always respond like this――

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……Not yet.
Neo Universe responded. She seemed to be having fun.
I had also been trying to observe Neo Universe―― I tried telling a joke like that.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Neo Universe……"Observation" ……by Trainer……?
Oops. If someone heard those words, they might get the wrong idea.
I was just trying to get to know the Uma Musume I was in charge of―― I panicked, telling her I didn't mean anything strange by it.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Hmmm……Affirmative.
Neo Universe nodded her head. It seems like I was able to make her understand……probably.
I could hear festival music off in the distance. Right about now, the Uma Musume participating in the training camp were probably heading to the festival.
choice_data_list: I'm glad the skies are clear

text_block_list.text: Lately, the nights had been cloudy and I haven't been able to see the stars. It was the last day, and I could see a night sky that couldn't be seen in the city――
Suddenly, I remembered the night Neo Universe was on the rooftop looking up at the sky.

text_block_list.name: Energetic Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Hurry, hurry! It's a festival! A festival~! We worked hard during training camp after all, so at the end we've gotta have fun~!

text_block_list.name: Excited Uma Musume
text_block_list.text: Yeah, yeah! I want to conquer all the food stalls!

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……"Light Years"……it doesn't reach here, but ……Today, more so than yesterday……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Ah……
Neo Universe spotted me and then came running. ――Good, I thought she might have already headed out.
Neo Universe stood in front of me as I caught my breath.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……Trainer?
choice_data_list: Do you have any plans tonight?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Plans…… ……Neo Universe has……for Trainer……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……has been……"Searching"…… That's why, together……with Trainer……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……Secret place……?
I brought Neo Universe to the seaside, far away from the festival music.
choice_data_list: You can see the stars from here!

text_block_list.text: The stars sparkled in Neo Universe's eyes. With the way the starry sky reflected off of the ocean, it almost felt like we were floating in space.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: Trainer……have you ……been observing……Neo Universe?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……I thought there wouldn't be a "Landing".

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……But Trainer did……a "Fly-by"…… and the "Trajectory"……wasn't a "Planet"……
Neo Universe had wanted to see the stars―― I had no doubts that that was what she wanted.
In the end, it seems like I was correct. But there was also the possibility that she also wanted to go to the festival.
choice_data_list: I wanted to see it together……

text_block_list.text: My feelings of wanting to show her this, and my feelings of wanting to see this together with her aligned. Though I may have been a bit forceful.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……No. Neo Universe……felt 『Fuzzy』 inside. This is 『Joy』 isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……"Observation" isn't done yet…… But……we're "Synchronized" it seems……

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……You'll be 『Elated』. Like "Hope" will arrive.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……close your eyes. Since it will be bright, slowly……
I closed my eyes as she said. And when I heard a small voice say 『Open them』――
It was almost like――
I could still feel the ground below me……I think. I was sure it was just an illusion, being completely engulfed by the stars and Neo Universe……
But, she had just told me that it would be 『Bright』. Which meant, this was……an overwhelming scene before my eyes, one that would make my feet unsteady.

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: I'm right here.
Neo Universe stood before me, as if supporting me. Her eyes were focused on me, watching my reaction, but filled with anxiety and anticipation.
I didn't care if this was real or an illusion. Whatever it was, I was feeling 『Elated』.
Neo Universe seemed to be fidgety and a little shy. Perhaps it was just my imagination.
choice_data_list: I was able to observe you

text_block_list.name: Neo Universe
text_block_list.text: ……Ehehe.
Neo Universe showed me a smile――One filled with innocence and felt as if it was just like the stars.
